title: Modern and Colonial Lima City Tour.
description:
All the Guidance is done with headphones and special radio guide equipment, we are the only agency in Lima - Peru, that uses this tourist guidance system.

That makes this tourist tour much more personalized and that our tourists do not miss the narration of our guides during their tours.

It shows the main attractions of the ancient and modern city of Lima. The entire tour from start to finish is accompanied by a guide specialized in the history and culture of the city, who will make your tour enjoyable and fun. We use Headphones during the tour so that our passengers do not lose the narration of the tour guide. We offer a demonstration and tasting of Pisco Sour, for these reasons they make it a different tour from the others.

reviews.title: Visit of the center of Lima organized
reviews.text: I did the full day tour in July last year with a friend. The tour as such was not bad. It is safe and informative.Negative points:They ask to leave a good comment without having started the tour, just one gets on, in exchange for a discount on an upcoming tour.It was supposed that in the convent, the visit to the catacombs was included but no, only the floor above was visited.The tour ends with a visit to a Souvenir with which they work and make a pisco tasting. DO NOT shop there, prices are inflated, days later we saw the same bottles of pisco or souvenirs that we bought 3 times less than the price we paid there in another souvenir or even in the supermarket.
